tool_description: Convert case and count characters, words, sentences, paragraphs and spaces.
name: TextNerd.io
title: TextNerd.io

api_list.name: Sentencecase Text
api_list.description:
Convert first letter of a sentence to uppercase.
Example: 'the road warrior. a man of mistery.' => 'The road warrior. A man of mistery.'

For more information on Sentence Case please review the Tutorial tab.

See the About page for more information and limits.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textnerd-io.p.rapidapi.com/api/sentencecase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textnerd-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Alternatecase Text
api_list.description:
Alternalte case in every letter, starting with uppercase letter.
Example: 'the road warrior' => 'ThE RoAd wArRiOr'

See the About page for more information and limits.
api_list.code:

url = "https://textnerd-io.p.rapidapi.com/api/alternatecase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textnerd-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Invertedcase Text
api_list.description:
Invert case in every letter.
Example 1: 'tHe rOaD WaRrIoR' => 'ThE RoAd wArRiOr'
Example 2: 'ThE RoAd wArRiOr' => 'tHe rOaD WaRrIoR'

See the About page for more information and limits.
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textnerd-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Capcase Text
api_list.description:
Convert all words to capital case.
Example: 'the road warrior' =>  'The Road Warrior'

See the About page for more information and limits.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textnerd-io.p.rapidapi.com/api/capcase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textnerd-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Lowercase Text
api_list.description:
Convert all letters in all words to lower case.
Example: 'THE ROAD WARRIOR' => 'the road warrior'

See the About page for more information and limits.
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textnerd-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Uppercase Text
api_list.description:
Convert all letters in all words  to upper case.
Example: 'the road warrior' => 'THE ROAD WARRIOR'

See the About page for more information and limits.
